title: We 🖤 Big Dogs! No weight limit, few breed restrictions!
map_address: 1799 N Decatur Blvd. near Lake Mead
posting_body: 1799 North Decatur Boulevard Las Vegas, NV 89108
Move into this home in a two-bedroom, two-bathroom floor plan from Diamondhead and experience the resort-like apartment lifestyle!
Your mornings can begin by freshening up in the en-suite bathroom, where you can enjoy a soak in the deep Roman tub.
The walk-in closet not only helps with wardrobe storage but doubles as a changing room where you can organize your outfit for the day.
After getting dressed, enjoy the morning sun for a few minutes on your private patio.
Before heading out, prepare a quick meal in the spacious kitchen, with breakfast nook and stainless appliances with gas stoves.
After a long day, come back and enjoy a dip in the cool resort-like pool, or just soak your worries away in the nearby spa.
The famed Las Vegas Strip is nearby as well, in case you’d like to visit.
All of these are mere samples of the apartment life here at Diamondhead.
Speak with your Leasing Consultant for details.
We welcome your pet, up to two per apartment.
Exotic Pets and Reptiles are not allowed.
All other types of pets must be approved by the Property Manager.
